```{r}

videos_joined <- videos_tbl |> 
    select(publishedAt,title, description, embeds, 
           channelId, category) |> 
    filter(publishedAt >= lubridate::ymd('2024-04-22')-1)

videos <- videos_joined |>  
    split(videos_joined$category) 
    

headings <- names(videos)
```
